hackathon-description-text: TerribleHacks gives you the freedom to work on whatever you want with no consequences or restrictions. Bring out your most absurd, out of the box or just downright shitty ideas in order to gain experience in new technologies or build up your previous skills.
hackathon-requirements: Anyghing as long as it is not useful.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: We just wanted to see, how bad can it really be. We hope to be disappointed.
The people will have the chance to vote, to determine which idea is truly the most Terrible.
This award goes to the most / horrible / dark / useless hardware hack at the event. Named in honor of the most hilarious creation ever at TerribleHacks.
Your AI may not be able to take over the world yet, but it will definitely be shitty!

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Did you have to split the atom to make this meme?
